Greetings adventurers!
We are happy to announce the release of a new skill, Lockpicking!
Improvements: - Added a new event with new monsters and items. - Added a new skill, the Lockpicking. - Separated the skills on the character page to four groups instead of the existing two. (Combat, Magic, Trade and Shadow skills.) - Lowered the amount of the gnoll's attack.
Bugfixes: - Fixed a bug that enabled players to gain a lot of defense experience while fighting the monsters. The defense experience that a player can gain while fighting a monster is based on the monster's level. - Fixed a bug that made players stuck in combat and unable to explore. - Fixed the combat messages when using ranged attacks. The players no longer shooting themselves. - Fixed a wrong text entry on the abandoned hunting lodge event.
Daggers and Sorcery Team
